content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you having an electrical, plumbing, or HVAC issue?
Hey, yeah, I have an issue with one of the outlets not working.
Thank you for letting me know. I'd be happy to help get this sorted. Can I get your name, please, so I can book you in for electrical service?
Thanks, Greg. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm we serve your area and schedule a visit?
Actually, before we do all that, I think I’m going to try to fix it myself. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer decided to attempt the repair themselves.

content: No problem, Greg! If you change your mind or need professional assistance, just text us and we’ll be here to help. Good luck with your repair!
reason: Customer decided to attempt the repair themselves.
